t: How to Perform Brand Analysis Using NBD Dirichlet Model

The Dirichlet (aka NBD-Dirichlet) model is a well known marketing research model for describing the purchase incidence and brand choice of consumer products[fn:1]. We estimate the model and summarize various theoretical quantities of interest to marketing researchers.
